about_the_game:
Cherry Island Demo Overview


Experience a taste of Cherry Island with our demo, offering a variety of exciting gameplay modes:

  • Three Solo Missions: Dive into a mix of intense, action-packed missions designed to showcase the game's diverse challenges
  • High-Speed Car Chase: Test your driving skills in a thrilling car racing mission.
  • FPS Combat: Engage in heart-pounding first-person shooter action with dynamic combat scenarios.
  • Jet Combat Simulation: Pilot advanced jets in a realistic aerial combat simulation for a high-flying experience.
  • Battle Royale Editor Area: Explore and engage in a sample area of our Battle Royale mode, giving you a glimpse of the strategic gameplay.
This demo provides a glimpse into the varied and immersive experiences Cherry Island has to offer. For the full adventure and more content, be sure to check out the complete game! Enjoy your playtime!

Cherry Island Demo Overview


Experience a taste of Cherry Island with our demo, offering a variety of exciting gameplay modes:

  • Three Solo Missions: Dive into a mix of intense, action-packed missions designed to showcase the game's diverse challenges
  • High-Speed Car Chase: Test your driving skills in a thrilling car racing mission.
  • FPS Combat: Engage in heart-pounding first-person shooter action with dynamic combat scenarios.
  • Jet Combat Simulation: Pilot advanced jets in a realistic aerial combat simulation for a high-flying experience.
  • Battle Royale Editor Area: Explore and engage in a sample area of our Battle Royale mode, giving you a glimpse of the strategic gameplay.
This demo provides a glimpse into the varied and immersive experiences Cherry Island has to offer. For the full adventure and more content, be sure to check out the complete game! Enjoy your playtime!

name: Cherry Island Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 - 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 4790 / AMD FX 8350 Wraith
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11.0 Compatible video card (AMD Radeon RX 480 4GB / nVidia GeForce GTX 1060 3GB)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 9 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Sound card, speaker or headphone
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 - 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-13600K / i5-13600 AMD Ryzen 5 7600X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 6700 XT - NVIDIA RTX 3060 Ti
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 9 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Sound card, speaker or headphone

short_description: Experience Cherry Island with this demo: 3 solo missions, including high-speed car chases, FPS combat, and jet simulations. Plus, explore a sample of our Battle Royale mode. Get a taste of the action. Purchase the full game for the complete adventure!
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain
*languages with full audio support
